handNote.p: Contemporary annotator. s. xi2d upward-sloping; horned e with long tongue;
Later annotator (Ker, p. 355). s. xiiLight brown ink; d upward-sloping; horned e; long-s on line; ð flagged; adds 'elena' several times.
